content: Mi disse che aveva perso il suo orologio.
translations: eng:He told me he'd lost his watch
eng:He told me that he had lost his watch
eng:He told me that he'd lost his watch
eng:She told me she'd lost her watch
eng:She told me that she'd lost her watch
